The Samsung The Frame is capable of switching, adjusting audio volume, muting, and changing TV channels. It is currently powered off. The Samsung 8 Series also supports similar capabilities and is currently powered on, with the ability to switch channels and adjust audio settings.

2) The current state of the Samsung The Frame (49) is powered off and set to channel 42, which means it requires powering on before any channel changes can be made. The Samsung 8 Series (82) is powered on but does not have a channel set. Actionable controls include turning on the Samsung The Frame and changing its channel to 5, or alternatively, using the Samsung 8 Series if the first device is unresponsive.
